data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control to Hold Public Licensing Workshop in Los Angeles
data.excerpt: SACRAMENTO – The Bureau of Cannabis Control (Bureau) will host a public licensing workshop in Los Angeles on October 12.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control

og_meta.site_description: Learn about California cannabis laws and licenses
